item.aether_crystallium.cactus_flower_pe: Cactus Flower Petal Ice Cream Bucket
lore.block.aether_crystallium.holystone_: A decoration block that is crafted from Holystone, Skyroot Sticks and an Ambrosium Torch. This Lantern also works in the Aether.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.sentry_lan: A decoration block that is crafted from Carved Stone, Sentry Stone and an Ambrosium Torch. This Lantern also works in the Aether.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.angelic_la: A decoration block that is crafted from Angelic Stone, Light Angelic Stone and an Ambrosium Torch. This Lantern also works in the Aether.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.hellfire_l: A decoration block that is crafted from Hellfire Stone, Light Hellfire Stone and an Ambrosium Torch. This Lantern also works in the Aether.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.aether_qua: An ore that is a source of Quartz in the Aether.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.quicksoil_: A building block that is created by combining Quickstone and Quicksoil that is exactly as slippery as Quicksoil.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.quickstone: A block that generates in the Quicksoil Desert that makes the biome easier to traverse as it isn't slippery. It can also be used to craft Quicksoil Bricks.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.quicksoil_: Crafted from Quicksoil Bricks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing! They also have the same properties as Quicksoil!
Crafted from Quicksoil Bricks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too! They also have the same properties as Quicksoil!
Crafted from Quicksoil Bricks. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away! They also have the same properties as Quicksoil!
lore.block.aether_crystallium.aether_cac: A spiky plant found in the Quicksoil Desert. You can remove its spikes by stripping it with an axe. It is also a great source for Lime Dye.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.stripped_a: A version of the Aether Cactus that doesn't hurt you which makes it perfect for building cactus houses. It is also a great source for Lime Dye.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.cactus_flo: A nice decoration block found on top of Giant Aether Cacti .It is also a great source for Red Dye.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.small_aeth: A small version version of the regular Aether cactus that can be crafted into Red Dye.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.moonlit_tu: A tulip that generates in the Highlands Taiga. It can either be crafted into Blue Dye or enchanted into Lapis Lazuli.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.enchanted_: A flower that generates in the Enchanted Woods. It can either be crafted into Orange Dye or enchanted into Glowstone Dust.
The enchanted version of Sentry Stone, found in Ancient Valkyrie Libraries
lore.block.aether_crystallium.blighted_s: The blighted version of Sentry Stone, found in Ancient Valkyrie Laboratories
lore.block.aether_crystallium.highlands_: The log of a tree found in a very cold region of the Aether, the Highlands Taiga. When put in a Crafting Table they will provide 4 Highlands Pine Planks.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.stripped_h: A Highlands Pine Log that had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a Crafting Table they will provide 4 Highlands Pine Planks.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.highlands_: A building block crafted from Highlands Pine Logs. When put in a Crafting Table they will provide 4 Highlands Pine Planks.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.stripped_h: A building block crafted from Stripped Highlands Pine Logs. When put in a Crafting Table they will provide 4 Highlands Pine Planks.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.highlands_: Crafted from Highlands Pine Logs. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!It is also useful for creating custom trees!
lore.block.aether_crystallium.stripped_h: Crafted from Stripped Highlands Pine Logs. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away! It is also useful for creating custom trees!
lore.block.aether_crystallium.highlands_: Crafted from Highlands Pine Wood. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!It is also useful for creating custom trees!
lore.block.aether_crystallium.stripped_h: Crafted from Stripped Highlands Pine Wood. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!It is also useful for creating custom trees!
lore.block.aether_crystallium.highlands_: Frostpine Planks can be made into various tools, blocks and items. They are crafted from Highlands Pine Logs, and make a great building material.
These leaves generate with Highlands Pine Trees. They can drop Highlands Pine Saplings when decaying.
These small blue saplings will grow into Highlands Pine Trees. They can be grown faster with Bone Meal.
Crafted from Highlands Pine Planks, a button used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
Crafted from Highlands Pine Planks, an ornate door helpful for keeping an enclosed and safe space without worry of monsters wandering in.
Crafted from Highlands Pine Planks and Sticks. Great for keeping your livestock safe from wandering predators!
Crafted from Sticks and Highlands Pine Planks. Gives a homely entrance and exit to your precious enclosures.
Crafted from Highlands Pine Planks. A wooden pressure plate used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
Crafted from Highlands Pine Planks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
Crafted from Highlands Pine Planks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
Crafted from Highlands Pine Planks. A Trapdoor useful for covering entryways one block wide. Often used to add extra protection to staircases.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.sunroot_lo: The log of a tree found in a very rare biome of the Aether, the Enchanted Woods. When put in a Crafting Table they will provide 4 Sunroot Planks.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.stripped_s: A Sunroot Log that had its bark stripped away with an Axe. When put in a Crafting Table they will provide 4 Sunroot Planks.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.sunroot_wo: A building block crafted from Sunroot Logs. When put in a Crafting Table they will provide 4 Sunroot Planks.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.stripped_s: A building block crafted from Stripped Sunroot Logs. When put in a Crafting Table they will provide 4 Sunroot Planks.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.sunroot_lo: Crafted from Sunroot Logs. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away! It is also useful for creating custom trees!
lore.block.aether_crystallium.stripped_s: Crafted from Stripped Sunroot Logs. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!It is also useful for creating custom trees!
lore.block.aether_crystallium.sunroot_wo: Crafted from Sunroot Wood. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!It is also useful for creating custom trees!
lore.block.aether_crystallium.stripped_s: Crafted from Stripped Highlands Pine Wood. Can be used for decorative enclosures and defences. Great for keeping nasty intruders away!It is also useful for creating custom trees!
lore.block.aether_crystallium.sunroot_pl: Frostpine Planks can be made into various tools, blocks and items. They are crafted from Sunroot Logs, and make a great building material.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.sunroot_le: These leaves generate with Sunroot Trees. They can drop Sunroot Saplings when decaying.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.sunroot_sa: These small white saplings will grow into huge Sunroot Trees. They can be grown faster with Bone Meal.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.sunroot_bu: Crafted from Sunroot Planks, a button used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.sunroot_do: Crafted from Sunroot Planks, an ornate door helpful for keeping an enclosed and safe space without worry of monsters wandering in.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.sunroot_fe: Crafted from Sunroot Planks and Sticks. Great for keeping your livestock safe from wandering predators!
Crafted from Sticks and Sunroot Planks. Gives a homely entrance and exit to your precious enclosures.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.sunroot_pr: Crafted from Sunroot Planks. A wooden pressure plate used to activate mechanisms and redstone.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.sunroot_sl: Crafted from Sunroot Planks. Slabs are half blocks, versatile for decoration and smooth slopes. Try adding some to a building's roofing!
lore.block.aether_crystallium.sunroot_st: Crafted from Sunroot Planks. Stairs are useful for adding verticality to builds and are often used for decoration too!
lore.block.aether_crystallium.sunroot_tr: Crafted from Sunroot Planks. A Trapdoor useful for covering entryways one block wide. Often used to add extra protection to staircases.
lore.block.aether_crystallium.cracked_sl: A failed experiment of the Ancient Valkyries that can only be mined by Gravitite or better pickaxes. It also some Redstone functionality.
lore.item.aether_crystallium.aechor_peta: A sweat desert crafted by putting Aechor Petals, Sugar, Icestone and a Skyroot Bucket in a Crafting Table
lore.item.aether_crystallium.cactus_flow: A sweat desert crafted by putting Cactus Petals Petals, Sugar, Icestone and a Skyroot Bucket in a Crafting Table
Crafted from Cactus Flowers or by converting Aechor Petals using a Remedy Bucket, this item can be enchanted into Redstone Dust.
